name: Resolve (PastoriVasara)
description:
Our game, Resolve, is a card and dice rolling game taking place in a dystopian future, where your only escape from the dread of everyday life is love. Would you keep your resolve when a mysterious force threathens to take that love away from you? Would you just roll the dice and be prepared to sacrifice everything?

You win a single battle by having higher Resolve value than your opponent which is indicated by the value in the middle of the card. Winning a battle gives you the dice from the middle of the board and you gain as much Lifepoints as the dies face value.

All the art in the game are procedurally generated by AI.
Right Clicking a card will zoom in so you can see the effect more clearly.
